startHLSstream.title: Start HLS Stream
startHLSstream.description: This API let you start an HLS stream by passing roomId and config object as body parameters.

postParameters.description: Config object contains layout object which accept _`type`_  with value **GRID** | **SPOTLIGHT** | **SIDEBAR**. _`priority`_ with value **SPEAKER** | **PIN** ,and _`gridSize`_ which accept number <=25.
